resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "This is the description for the Washtrak API."
  version: 0.1.0
  title: WashTrak API
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
  contact:
    name: Florian Reitz
    url: https://reitz.dev
    email: flo@reitz.dev
servers:
  - url: https://wahshback.reitz.dev
tags:
  - name: auth
    description: Everything about the authentication
  - name: machines
    description: Everything about the machines
  - name: users
    description: Everything about the users
paths:
  /auth/login:
    post:
      security:
        - basicAuth: []
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: Authentication to obtain JWT token
      description: Authentication to obtain JWT token
      operationId: login
      responses:
          '200':
            description: a JSON web token (JWT) required to login.
            content:
              application/jwt:
                schema:
                  type: string
          "401":
            description: User not authenticated
  /machines:
    get:
      operationId: getMachine
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Gets all machines
      description: Gets all machines
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Machine"
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    put:
      operationId: putMachine
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Adds a new machine
      description: 'Adds a new machine'
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/MachineCreate"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
  "/machines/id/{id}":
    get:
      operationId: getMachineById
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Find a machine by ID
      description: Returns a single machine
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ID of machine to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Machine"
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    delete:
      operationId: deleteMachineById
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Deletes a machine by ID
      description: Deletes a machine by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Pet id to delete
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    post:
      operationId: updateMachineByID
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Updates a machine by ID
      description: Updates a machine by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ID of machine to update
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/MachineCreate"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
  "/machines/name/{name}":
    get:
      operationId: getMachineByName
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Find a machine by name
      description: Returns a single pet
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: Name of machine to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Machine"
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    delete:
      operationId: deleteMachineByName
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Deletes a machine by name
      description: Deletes a machine by name
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: Name of machine to delete
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    post:
      operationId: updateMachineByName
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - machines
      summary: Updates a machine by name
      description: Deletes a machine by name
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: Name of machine to update
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/MachineCreate"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
  /users:
    get:
      operationId: getAllUsers
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - users
      summary: Gets all users
      description: Fetches all users
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    put:
      operationId: putNewUser
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - users
      summary: Adds a new user
      description: Adds a new user
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/UserCreate"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
           
  "/users/id/{id}":
    get:
      operationId: getUserById
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - users
      summary: Find a user by ID
      description: Returns a single user
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ID of user to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    delete:
      operationId: deleteUserById
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - users
      summary: Deletes a user by ID
      description: Delete a user by id
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: User id to delete
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
    post:
      operationId: updateUserById
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - users
      summary: Updates a user by ID
      description: Updates a user by Id
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ID of machine to user
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/UserCreate"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
        "401":
          description: User not authenticated
        "404":
          description: Machine not found
        "403":
          description: User has not the correct rights
        "409":
           description: The ressource-request returned an error
externalDocs:
  description: Find out more about Swagger
  url: http://swagger.io
components:
  securitySchemes:
    basicAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  requestBodies:
    MachineCreate:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MachineCreate"
      description: Machine Object that needs to be added
      required: true
    UserCreate:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserCreate"
      description: User Object that needs to be added
      required: true
  schemas:
    Machine:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - status
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
          example: wash1
        status:
          type: string
          description: status of the machine
          enum:
            - running
            - ready
            - spinning  
        running_threshold:
          type: number
          example: 0.4
          description: Float value, that is multiplied with the base value and the added to it
        spinning_threshold:
          type: number
          example: 6.2
          description: Float value, that is multiplied with the base value and the added to it
    MachineCreate:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - status
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          example: wash1
        status:
          type: string
          description: status of the machine
          enum:
            - running
            - ready
            - spinning
        running_threshold:
          type: number
          example: 0.4
          description: Float value, that is multiplied with the base value and the added to it
        spinning_threshold:
          type: number
          example: 6.2
          description: Float value, that is multiplied with the base value and the added to it   
    User:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - password
        - type
      properties:
        id:
          type: number
          example: 1
        name:
          type: string
          example: user
        password_hash:
          type: string
          example: passwordHash
        type:
          type: string
          example: admin
    UserCreate:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - password
        - type
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          example: user
        password:
          type: string
          example: password
        type:
          type: string
          example: admin
